title: Calories in 4x4 In-N-Out Burger
meta_description: Learn the 4x4 in n out calories—about 1090 kcal—plus full nutrition facts for protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard 4x4 burger with sesame seed bun, 4 beef patties, 4 cheese slices, lettuce, tomato, onion, and Thousand Island-style spread; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact preparation, and customizations; based on In-N-Out's official data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A 4x4 In-N-Out burger packs ~1090 kcal and ~63 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Protein style (no bun, wrapped in lettuce)
Animal style (extra spread, grilled onions, mustard-fried patty)

faqs.q: How many calories in a 4x4 In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: Approximately 1090 calories for the standard version.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in 4x4 In-N-Out calories query?
faqs.a: About 63 g of protein, mainly from the four beef patties.

faqs.q: How much fat and sodium in a 4x4 In-N-Out?
faqs.a: 67 g total fat (32 g saturated) and 2440 mg sodium.

faqs.q: Are 4x4 In-N-Out calories different without the bun?
faqs.a: Yes, protein style drops it to ~790 kcal by removing the bun.

faqs.q: How do carbs factor into 4x4 In-N-Out calories?
faqs.a: 39 g carbs, mostly from the bun, with 2 g fiber and 10 g sugars.
